flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 2/5 = <<30*2/5=12>>12 members ordered lemon juice.
So, 30 - 12 = <<30-12=81>>81 members did not order lemon juice.
Since 1/3 of the remaining ordered mango juice, then 81 x 1/3 = <<81*1/3=27>>27 members ordered mango juice.
Therefore, 81 - 27 = <<81-27=54>>54 members ordered orange juice.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
